result.eng: The article was written by the president.
result.ga: An t-uachtarán a scríobh an t-alt
result.orig: An t-uachtarán a scríobh an t-alt
result.html: An t-uachtarán a scríobh an t-altThe article was written by the president.
result.ponchtml: An t-uaċtarán a scríoḃ an t-altThe article was written by the president.

result.eng: Would you like to write an article?
result.ga: Ar mhaith leat alt a scríobh
result.orig: Ar mhaith leat alt a scríobh
result.html: Ar mhaith leat alt a scríobhWould you like to write an article?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat alt a scríoḃWould you like to write an article?

result.eng: The secretary was busy writing letters.
result.ga: Bhí an rúnaí gnóthach ag scríobh litreacha
result.orig: Bhí an rúnaí gnóthach ag scríobh litreacha
result.html: Bhí an rúnaí gnóthach ag scríobh litreachaThe secretary was busy writing letters.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an rúnaí gnóṫaċ ag scríoḃ litreaċaThe secretary was busy writing letters.

result.html: Ní scríobhaim litreacha go minicI don't write letters often.
result.ponchtml: Ní scríoḃaim litreaċa go minicI don't write letters often.

result.ga: Scríobh cúig leathanach ar a mhéad
result.orig: Scríobh cúig leathanach ar a mhéad
result.html: Scríobh cúig leathanach ar a mhéadWrite five pages at most.
result.ponchtml: Scríoḃ cúig leaṫanaċ ar a ṁéadWrite five pages at most.

result.html: Scríobh Pádraig graiméar GaeilgePatrick wrote an Irish grammar.
result.ponchtml: Scríoḃ Pádraig graiméar GaeilgePatrick wrote an Irish grammar.

result.eng: He wrote memoirs about Nazi death camps.
result.ga: Scríobh sé cuimhní cinn faoi champaí báis na Naitsithe
result.orig: Scríobh sé cuimhní cinn faoi champaí báis na Naitsithe
result.html: Scríobh sé cuimhní cinn faoi champaí báis na NaitsitheHe wrote memoirs about Nazi death camps.
result.ponchtml: Scríoḃ sé cuiṁní cinn faoi ċampaí báis na NaitsiṫeHe wrote memoirs about Nazi death camps.

result.html: Scríobh sé leabharHe wrote a book.
result.ponchtml: Scríoḃ sé leaḃarHe wrote a book.

result.html: Scríobh sí abairt ghairidShe wrote a short sentence.
result.ponchtml: Scríoḃ sí abairt ġairidShe wrote a short sentence.

result.html: Scríobh sí nóta gairidShe wrote a short note.
result.ponchtml: Scríoḃ sí nóta gairidShe wrote a short note.

result.eng: It took me half a year to write the book.
result.ga: Thóg sé leathbhliain orm an leabhar a scríobh
result.orig: Thóg sé leathbhliain orm an leabhar a scríobh
result.html: Thóg sé leathbhliain orm an leabhar a scríobhIt took me half a year to write the book.
result.ponchtml: Ṫóg sé leaṫḃliain orm an leaḃar a scríoḃIt took me half a year to write the book.

result.eng: Have you read everything these authors have written?
result.ga: Ar léigh tú gach ar scríobh na húdair seo
result.orig: Ar léigh tú gach ar scríobh na húdair seo
result.html: Ar léigh tú gach ar scríobh na húdair seoHave you read everything these authors have written?
result.ponchtml: Ar léiġ tú gaċ ar scríoḃ na húdair seoHave you read everything these authors have written?

result.eng: In that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.
result.ga: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blag
result.orig: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blag
result.html: Sa chomhthéacs sin b'fhéidir nárbh fhiú an trioblóid le bheith ag scríobh blagIn that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.
result.ponchtml: Sa ċoṁṫéacs sin b'ḟéidir nárḃ ḟiú an trioblóid le ḃeiṫ ag scríoḃ blagIn that context, maybe writing a blog just wasn't worth the trouble.

result.eng: He pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.
result.ga: Tharraing sé air leabhar scríobh dornán inti agus dhruid arís í
result.orig: Tharraing sé air leabhar scríobh dornán inti agus dhruid arís í

result.ponchtml: Ṫarraing sé air leaḃar scríoḃ dornán inti agus ḋruid arís íHe pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.

result.eng: There is no describing the love I had for that girl.
result.ga: Níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaí
result.orig: Níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaí
